about_the_game:
Twilight Bastion is said to be an abyss situated between illusion and reality. Popularly believed to serve as purgatory for the condemned, you wake up in this very place, unaware of who you are, or why you've been sent to this winding, ominous castle to suffer its torture.

FEATURES

  • Collect Armor, Shields, & Weapons
Open chests, pillage corpses, or find secret areas to discover new armor, more sturdy shields, and more powerful weapons.

  • Define Your Playstyle
In Twilight Bastion, there is no predefined starter class; Throughout your quest, you will have the ability to naturally progress into your preferred playstyle. As you accrue Sanctity—the currency used to upgrade your stats—you can elect to invest in Strength and Dexterity to mold yourself into a swordsman; you could elect to invest in Intelligence to become a powerful sorcerer; or invest in Luck and Stamina to be more of a vagrant who's shifty and relies on luck to stumble into powerful items.

  • Vibrant Retro Graphics
Inspired by the 5th console generation, experience a world flush with detail, harboring the unique yet nostalgic graphical fidelity from the mid-90s.

  • Soulslike + Metroidvania
Twilight Bastion encompasses in-depth 3D Platforming where you will have to push, pull, climb, grab and shimmy your way into new areas to progress and find power ups. Simultaneously, you can expect a robust combat system with the ability to dodge, jump, block, parry and perform execution moves on your enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: Vibrant depictions of blood loss. Player discretion is advised.

name: Twilight Bastion Demo
short_description: Twilight Bastion is a retro-styled soulslike 3D Metroidvania that places you in a torturous labyrinthine castle where skeletons, the undead, and gothic black knights await around every corner.
